AbleToStopDrugs.Description:
Are you always able to stop using drugs when you want to? (If never use
drugs, answer “Yes.” )

AbuseMoreThanOneDrugAtATime.Description: Do you abuse more than one drug at a time?

AlcoholHowManyDrinksDay.Description: How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?

AlcoholHowOften.Description: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?

AlcoholHowOften6Drinks.Description: How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?

BlackoutFlashbackDrugUse.Description: Have you had "blackouts" or "flashbacks" as a result of drug use?

CannabisConsideredReduction.Description: Have you ever thought about cutting down, or stopping, your use of cannabis?

Levels.2: Yes but not in the past 6 months

CannabisHoursStoned.Description:
How many hours were you ‘stoned’ on
a typical day when you had been using
Cannabis?

CannabisHowOften.Description: How often do you use cannabis?

CannabisPast6Months.Description: Have you used any cannabis over the past 6 months?

CigsPerDay.Description: On average, how many cigarettes do you now smoke a day (1 pack = 20 cigarettes)?

Levels.1: Less than a cigarette a day

EngagedInIllegalActsToObtainDrugs.Description: Have you engaged in illegal activities in order to obtain drugs?

FeelBadGuiltyDrugUse.Description:
Do you ever feel bad or guilty about your drug use? If never use drugs,
choose “No.”

HowOftenCantStopCannabis.Description: How often during the past six months did you find that you were not able to stop using cannabis once you had started?

HowOftenCantStopDrinking.Description: How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?

HowOftenDevotedTimeCannabis.Description: How often in the past six months have you devoted a great deal of your time to getting, using, or recovering from cannabis?

HowOftenDrinkMorning.Description: How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?

HowOftenFailedActivitiesCannabis.Description: How often during the past six months did you fail to do what was normally expected from you because of using cannabis?

HowOftenFailedActivitiesDrinking.Description: How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected from you because of drinking?

HowOftenGuiltRemorseDrinking.Description: How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?

HowOftenHazardousCannabis.Description: How often do you use cannabis in situations that could be physically hazardous, such as driving, operating machinery, or caring for children?

HowOftenMemoryConcentrationProblemCannab.Description: How often in the past six months have you had a problem with your memory or concentration after using cannabis?

HowOftenUnableRememberDrinking.Description: How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because you had been drinking?

HowSoonSmokeAfterWaking.Description: How soon after you wake up do you smoke your first cigarette?

InjuredDrinking.Description: Have you or someone else been injured as a result of your drinking?

Levels.2: Yes but not in the last year

LifetimeSmoke100Cigs.Description: Altogether, have you smoked at least 100 or more cigarettes in your entire lifetime?

MedicalProblemsDueToDrugUse.Description:
Have you had medical problems as a result of your drug use (e.g.,
memory loss, hepatitis, convulsions, bleeding, etc.)?

NeglectedFamilyDrugUse.Description: Have you neglected your family because of your use of drugs?

OtherDrugs.Description: Have you used drugs other than those required for medical reasons?

OtherTobaccoProducts.Description: In the past 30 days, what tobacco products OTHER THAN cigarettes have you used (check all that apply)?

RelativeFriendConcernedDrinking.Description: Has a relative or friend or a doctor or another health worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?

Levels.2: Yes but not in the last year

SmokeEveryDay.Description: Do you now smoke cigarettes every day, some days or not at all?

SpouseParentsComplainDrugUse.Description:
Does your spouse (or parents) ever complain about your involvement
with drugs?

WidthdrawalSymptoms.Description:
Have you ever experienced withdrawal symptoms (felt sick) when you
stopped taking drugs?
